description: Web Developer eager to work and expand my knowledge.

about.intro: I am a Full Stack Developer with a great passion for technology, specializing in Backend and Frontend. I love learning and taking on new challenges, exploring different tools and languages to create efficient, scalable, and innovative solutions that provide real value.
about.skills: I have excellent organization and teamwork skills, easily adapting to different environments. My focus is on problem-solving and agile development, always prioritizing quality and code optimization to achieve the best results.
about.ai: Currently, I am delving into the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning, exploring how these technologies can be integrated into web development and software. I am motivated by the challenge of learning new paradigms and applying them to innovative projects.
about.job: I am actively seeking new opportunities as a web developer, where I can apply my knowledge and continue growing professionally. I am excited about the idea of being part of a dynamic team where I can contribute my skills and keep evolving in this exciting field.
